homework4

Class ColorGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • homework4.ColorGenerator

  • public class ColorGenerator
extends java.util.Observable
    ColorGenerator represents an object that changes its color every 2 seconds. ColorGenerator determines the color for the Panel class therefore it is the subject class for Panel object. Only one object of ColorGenerator can be created due to the implementation design (Singelton). In order to notify the observers panels, ColorGenerator holds a list of observers.
